00038 namespace lbann
00039 {
00040     // FullyConnectedLayer : dense layer class
00041     class FullyConnectedLayer : public Layer
00042     {
00043     public:
00044       FullyConnectedLayer(uint index,
00045                           int numPrevNeurons,
00046                           uint numNeurons,
00047                           uint miniBatchSize,
00048                           activation_type activationType,
00049                           weight_initialization init,
00050                           lbann_comm* comm,
00051                           Optimizer *optimizer,
00052                           std::vector<regularizer*> regs={});
00053       ~FullyConnectedLayer();
00054       void setup(int numPrevNeurons);
00055       DistMat& get_weights_biases() { return WB_view; }
00056       DistMat& get_weights_biases_gradient() { return WB_D_view; }
00057       DistMat& get_activations() { return Acts_view; }
00058       bool update();
00059       DataType checkGradient(Layer& PrevLayer, const DataType Epsilon=1e-4);
00060       DataType computeCost(DistMat &deltas);
00061       DataType WBL2norm();
00062 
00063         // bool saveToFile(std::string FileDir);
00064         // bool loadFromFile(std::string FileDir);
00065 
00066     private:
00067 
00068       const weight_initialization m_weight_initialization;
00069 
00071       DistMat WB_view;
00073       DistMat WB_D_view;
00075       DistMat Acts_view;
00076 
00077     public:
00078       //Probability of dropping neuron/input used in dropout_layer
00079       //Range 0 to 1; default is -1 => no dropout
00080       DataType  WBL2NormSum;
00081 
00082     protected:
00083       void fp_linearity(ElMat& _WB, ElMat& _X, ElMat& _Z, ElMat& _Y);
00084       void bp_linearity();
00085     };
